summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsGive BackTreat your under-eye area with the rejuvenating Bean Hydrogel Eye Patch by Mixsoon. Designed to hydrate, firm, and brighten tired eyes, this formula consists of 4 types of fermented ingredients and 3 types of bean extracts.
details: DetailsBenefitsCreated to improve skin elasticity and deeply nourish delicate skin while reducing the appearance of wrinklesInfused with Vitamin E and Vitamin C, these patches offer powerful antioxidant and brightening benefitsThe hydrogel patch is soothing, while also boosts absorption of the formula onto the skinKey IngredientsSoybean Fermented Extract - Enhanced skin barrier funcation, improved hydration, and anti-aging effectsBarley Seed Ferment Filtrate - Enhanced hydration, improved skin elasticity, reduced inflammationItem 2643838How To UseApply the eye patches on under eye area after cleansing and leave on for 20-30 minutes. Gently pat to aid absorption.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Carrageenan, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Potassium Chloride, Hydroxyacetophenone, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Cellulose Gum, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Allantoin, Propanediol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Arbutin, Ethyl Ascorbyl Ether, Panthenol, Sucrose, Calcium Chloride, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Caprylyl Glycol, Adenosine,Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Tocopherol, Arginine, Glycine Max (Soybean) Seed Extract (40ppm),Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Lactobacillus/Soybean Ferment Extract (25ppm), Lactobacillus/Punica Granatum Fruit Ferment Extract, Saccharomyces/Barley Seed Ferment Filtrate, Lactobacillus/Pear Juice Ferment Filtrate, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Ascorbic Acid, Hydrolyzed Pea Protein (10ppm), Corallina Officinalis Extract.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply the eye patches on under eye area after cleansing and leave on for 20-30 minutes. Gently pat to aid absorption.
